post.author: 이성기

comment.author: 권상하
comment.content: 내컴퓨터->도구->폴더옵션->보기 폴더보기-모든폴더를 같은 보기로 설정할 수 있습니다. [현재 폴더 처럼]

post.content: My Window explorer displays files in small icons as default. Is there any way to change all folders displays with detail file view globally without View-Customize this folder one by one?
post.title: Window Explorer에서 Folder View를 변경하는 법?
